Posts.Content: hi Deb it will be 4 yrs in Sept that I finished chemo and about 5 weeks ago I woke up with severe pain in my hips pelvis and coccyx.I have had xrays and bone scan and no one can find a thing wrong. I do believe this a late affect post chemo affect and when I go to see my pain clinic nurse will ask her about as I seem to get the most honest answers from her,
Posts.Title: late term post chemo pain
